author: #s#8059
description:
Poll a question through people's custom statuses. Two kinds of polls are supported:
1. Open answers (open poll)
2. Multiple choice (number poll).
install_msg: Hi there, thanks for installing my cog! Ensure to configure the poll duration to your liking with `[p]poll_duration` !
short: Poll a question through people's custom statuses
name: StatusPoll
